translations: v.笨重地摔；猛然坐下；彻底失败（flop 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 背越式跳高；福斯贝利式跳高

sentences.sentence: The fish were flopping around in the bottom of the boat.
He has been criticized for flip-flopping on several key issues.
sentences.translation: 他由于在几个关键问题上变卦而备受指责。

sentences.sentence: The vice-president was accused of flip-flopping on several major issues.
sentences.translation: 副总统受到谴责，说他在几个重大问题上出尔反尔。
